effect.short: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.
effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2â€“3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
